author: Sergio Padilla
description: Dry sherry, chocolate and almond add subtle nuances to a base of cachaça and apple juice.
name: Orinoco cocktail
recipeIngredient: 45 ml Apple juice (apple cider) unsweetened & cloudy
7.5 ml White crème de cacao liqueur

recipeInstructions.text: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain into chilled glass
